definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Espersen also reaffirmed Denmark's adherence to the one-China policy and respect for China's sovereignty and territorial integrity.
sentences.chinese: 丹方坚持一个中国政策，尊重中国主权和领土完整。

sentences.english: China would like to make joint efforts with Denmark to push bilateral relations to a new level.
sentences.chinese: 中方愿与丹方共同努力，推动两国关系迈上新台阶。

definition: legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
maker of immortality pill/concocting magic pills

variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
